title: Best of The Herd for Aug 20, 2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Aug 20, 2019
description:
Baker Mayfield says the only thing that matters is winning so Colin points out that in the NFL Baker is actually a loser.  He isn't going to overreact to Jimmy Garoppolo struggling in a game he only took 11 snaps.  Plus, Super Bowl Champion Drew Brees talks about trying to rebound from their controversial loss to the Rams in the NFC Championship and how he's been able to maintain such a high level of success so late in his career.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
